# DiceDropper - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Interactive dice rolling web application with physics-based dice drop mechanics.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - JavaScript web app with dice physics simulation
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Created HTML, CSS, and JavaScript modules
- [x] Customize the Project - Implemented dice physics, rendering, and UI controls
- [x] Install Required Extensions - No additional extensions required
- [x] Compile the Project - No compilation needed (vanilla JavaScript)
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Ready to launch development server
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
